title: ID font in Logo
content:
Hi,

Intradiem is a vendor for the company I work for. I'm making a newsletter for print that features them and I can't find the font they used in their logo. It appears to be a blend of serif/sans font - not sure.

The image on this post is pulled from their site header at [www.intradiem.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822222915/http:/www.intradiem.com/ "www.intradiem.com")

Any help is greatly appreciated!

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822222915im_/http:/typophile.com/files/intradiem_6465.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [intradiem.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822222915/http:/typophile.com/files/intradiem.png) | 5.71 KB |
author: zactivix

comments.content: also --- I tried whatthefont and the fonts it suggested were close, but not quite there...

It’s [Aller](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822222915/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Aller).  
WhatTheFont only identifies fonts that are being sold at MyFonts.
Wow that was fast... Thanks, guys!
